lead_paragraph: Juventus won Serie A for the fifth season in a row without kicking a ball on Monday after Napoli, the only team that could have caught them, were sunk 1-0 by a late Radja Nainggolan goal at AS Roma.

headline.print_headline: Juventus Win Fifth Successive Serie A Title After Napoli Loss
headline.main: Juventus Win Fifth Successive Serie A Title After Napoli Loss
